9283.quoteText:
YOUR USE OF THE SERVICE IS AT YOUR SOLE RISK.
THE SERVICE IS PROVIDED ON AN "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE" BASIS.
9283.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk

tosdr.case: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk

9284.quoteText: You agree that regardless of any statute or law to the contrary, any claim or cause of action arising out of or related to use of the Service or these Terms must be filed within one (1) year after such claim or cause of action arose or be forever barred, unless required otherwise by applicable law.
9284.title: Users have a reduced time period to take legal action against the service

tosdr.case: You have a reduced time period to take legal action against the service

9286.quoteText: If any provision of these Terms is found by a court of competent jurisdiction to be invalid, the parties nevertheless agree that the court should endeavor to give effect to the parties' intentions as reflected in the provision, and the other provisions of these Terms remain in full force and effect.
9286.title: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder

tosdr.case: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder

11850.quoteText: You agree that any termination of your access to the Service under any provision of these Terms may be effected without prior notice, and acknowledge and agree that Genius may immediately deactivate or delete your account and all related information and files in your account and/or bar any further access to such files or the Service.
11850.title: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason

tosdr.case: Your account can be deleted without prior notice and without a reason

11851.quoteText: The Service does not support Do Not Track requests at this time, which means that we collect information about your online activity both while you are using the Service and after you leave our Service.
11851.title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

tosdr.case: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.

11852.quoteText: We employ tracking pixels (also known as web beacons) which are used to anonymously track the online usage patterns of our Users.
11852.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

tosdr.case: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting

11853.quoteText: We collect analytics data, or use third-party analytics tools, to help us measure traffic and usage trends for the Service.
11853.title: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics

tosdr.case: Third-party cookies are used for statistics

11854.quoteText: Online Behavioral Advertising: Some of our advertising (“Behavioral Advertising”) involves using tracking tools such as cookies, pixel tags, and web beacons, to collect information about a user’s online activities (over time and across non-affiliated websites and applications) and providing ads to the user based the user’s interests (as inferred from the user’s online activity) or use of our Service.
11854.title: Tracking via third-party cookies for advertising

tosdr.case: Third-party cookies are used for advertising

11855.quoteText: If you do not want to receive promotional emails from us, you can click the “unsubscribe” button on the promotional email communications or email us at privacy@genius.com with the subject “Marketing Opt-Out”.
11855.title: You can opt out of promotional communications

tosdr.case: You can opt out of promotional communications

11856.quoteText:
We reserve the right, in our sole discretion, to change or modify portions of these Terms at any time.
If we modify these Terms, we will post a notice at the top of our Service for a period of seven (7) days.
11856.title: The service may change its terms at any time, but the user will receive notification of the changes.

tosdr.case: The terms may be changed at any time, but you will receive notification of the changes

20954.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements (June 2020)

tosdr.case: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

20955.quoteText: By using the Service, you represent and warrant that you are 13 years of age or older.
20955.title: This service is only available to users over 13 years of age

tosdr.case: This service is only available to users over a certain age

20956.quoteText: Registration may not be required to view content on the Service, but even unregistered Users are bound by these Terms.
20956.title: No need to register

tosdr.case: No need to register

20957.quoteText: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your password and account, if any, and are fully responsible for any and all activities that occur under your password or account.
20957.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

tosdr.case: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

20958.quoteText: You agree to (a) immediately notify Genius of any unauthorized use of your password or account or any other breach of security, and (b) ensure that you exit from your account at the end of each session when accessing the Service.
20958.title: You must report to the service any unauthorized use of your account or any breach of security

tosdr.case: You must report to the service any unauthorized use of your account or any breach of security

20959.quoteText: What Personal Data Do We Collect From You?
20959.title: Details are provided about what kind of information they collect

tosdr.case: Details are provided about what kind of information they collect

20960.quoteText: We also receive information about you from some of our service providers
20960.title: Information is gathered about you through third parties

tosdr.case: Information is gathered about you through third parties

20961.title: This service tracks which web page referred you to it

tosdr.case: This service tracks which web page referred you to it

20962.quoteText: If you take part in any interactive features of the Service (such as any contests, games, promotions, quizzes, surveys, research or other services or features), you may provide us with additional types of Personal Data.
20962.title: Extra data may be collected about you through promotions

tosdr.case: Extra data may be collected about you through promotions

20963.quoteText: In addition, we also use tracking pixels in some HTML-based emails sent to our users to track which emails are opened and which links are clicked by recipients.
20963.title: Tracking pixels are used in service-to-user communication

tosdr.case: Tracking pixels are used in service-to-user communication

20964.quoteText: Some parts of our Service may include social media features, such as the Facebook “like” button, and widgets
20964.title: You are being tracked via social media cookies/pixels
